verbs.description: [V: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a Twitter post] said Mexico " must stop people from going through Mexico and into the U.S. "
[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a Twitter post] [V: said] [ARG1: Mexico " must stop people from going through Mexico and into the U.S.] "
Trump in a Twitter post said Mexico " [V: must] stop people from going through Mexico and into the U.S. "
Trump in a Twitter post said [ARG0: Mexico] " [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: stop] [ARG1: people] [ARG2: from going through Mexico and into the U.S.] "
Trump in a Twitter post said Mexico " must stop [ARG1: people] from [V: going] [ARGM-DIR: through Mexico and into the U.S.] "
